items.content: Sangat baik dalam koordinasi sebagai team member, memiliki semangat tinggi untuk berkembang.
items.author: I Gede Ngurah Yudi Saputra
items.title: Managed Veda directly

items.content: Veda is exceptionally ambitious, with an insatiable desire to master everything in the field of computer science. He’s not only eager to learn and grow but also excels as both a team leader and a team player. It was a pleasure working with him, and I would welcome the opportunity to collaborate with him again.
items.author: Muhammad Dylan Hikma Sanjaya
items.role: Software Developer | 2024 IISMA Awardee to University of Szeged
items.title: Worked at the same team

items.content: Veda is one of the most authentic web enthusiasts I've ever met. He is always curiosity about new frameworks and technologies. He is a proactive, collaborative, and highly motivated individual who would be a tremendous asset to any web development team — highly recommended!
items.author: Faris Faikar Razannafi
items.role: Fullstack Engineer at Speakology Ai, US
items.title: Worked at the same team
